alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Independence; Izard; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:40AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Stone, northwestern Independence, southwestern Izard, eastern Van Buren and Cleburne Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 240 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Thola to 6 miles northeast of Shirley to Choctaw. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Mountain View... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Cushman... Shirley... Concord... Higden... Herpel... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Blanchard Springs Campground... Fairfield Bay Marina... Croker... Fairbanks... Old Lexington... Choctaw... Bethesda... Bee Branch... Guion... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Independence; Izard; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
